item.title: “Yesterday is History, Tomorrow is a Mystery, and Today is a gift… That's Why They Call it Present”
item.description: “Yesterday is History, Tomorrow is a Mystery, and Today is a gift… That’s Why They Call it Present” ― Master Oogway
